评论详情: When i opened the package the earrings were broke. There were plastic pieces everywhere. Not sure if they were packaged like that or if they were broke during transport.
Doesn’t bother my sensitive ears! Bonus

Had ordered these for a groovy-themed party. The posts were already bent from the packaging, and since they were so cheaply made, I didnt want to attempt straightening them out for fear of breaking them right off.

The colors matched perfectly. But my surprise was when I picked up my package from the front porch, both posts of the earrings were poking through the brown semi padded envelope they were sent in. Wish they would have sent them in a little box to prevent bent posts.

I like the style he gave me that 70s vibe. I wore them to a 70s party but they weren’t worth what I paid. I think they were $5.99 or something I would’ve preferred to pay $1.25. but they served their purpose. I wore them for the occasion and they lasted for the occasion I have not worn them since. So I cannot say if they were last or not because I don’t wear them every day
One of the earrings were broken when it arrived.
I like them and they fit the party 70’s theme
